description: Jin Park - Rival Courier with branching ally/enemy paths

npc.name: Jin Park
npc.location: The Hollows → Red Harbor (as they advance)
npc.death_condition: Becomes enemy and escalates to violence

physical_description.appearance: Korean-American, lean and wiry build. Shaved sides, longer top (practical for courier work). Always in motion—fidgeting, bouncing, ready to run.
physical_description.style_aesthetic: Courier gear: Lightweight tactical wear, lots of pockets, reflective strips.

visible_augmentations.description: Enhanced leg actuators (jump higher, run faster)
Neon blue HUD glow in eyes, threat detection

physical_description.augmentation_notes: Moderate (Tier 3 standard). Got augments through corpo loan program (in debt).

speech_patterns: Drops facade when genuinely scared or grateful

motivations: Earn enough to pay off augment debt

background.origin_story: Grew up in The Hollows, child of immigrants who worked factory jobs. Decided early: 'I won't be trapped like them.' Became courier at 18, took corpo loan for augments at 20, jumped from Tier 0 to Tier 2 in six months.
background.current_situation: Now 24, Tier 3, and starting to realize the corpo loan was a trap. Minimum payments barely cover interest. Working twice as hard just to stay afloat. But won't admit it—keeps up the confident facade.
background.connection_to_player: Sees player as competition. Rivalry develops: competitive respect or bitter resentment depending on player choices.

secrets.description: Owes 20,000 credits to Nakamura, facing repossession
Terrified of repo teams taking their chrome

npc_relationships.relationship: Chen knows Jin, sees potential but worries about corpo loan
npc_relationships.chen_quote: That kid's gonna burn out or go broke. Hope they figure it out in time.

story_role.arc_summary: From cocky rival to grateful ally or bitter enemy. Their corpo debt crisis demonstrates system cruelty and tests player's values.

key_story_beats.description: Rival or ally interactions based on Tier 1 choice
Endgame presence based on all previous choices

possible_outcomes.outcome: Appears at Tier 9 Gathering, loyal ally

tier_1_choices.dialogue: You helped me. Why? We're competing. You should've left me. But... thanks. Seriously. I owe you.
I won't forget you left me there.

tier_1_choices.description: Player wins race, no crash involvement
tier_1_choices.dialogue: You're good. I'll give you that.

greetings.text: Yo, you're the new meat? Cute. You got no chrome, no speed, no chance. This is my route. Stay in your lane, fresh.
Hey, it's you. Look, about before... I owe you. For real. What do you need?
You. I remember what you did. Or didn't do. Watch your back.
Yo! Good timing. I was just about to hit this route. Wanna race? For old times' sake?
I... I need to talk. In person. It's urgent. Meet me at the Red Harbor docks. Please.
You saved my life. Twice. First the crash, now this. I don't know how to repay that. But I won't forget. Ever.

key_dialogue.text: I... I can't move my leg. Augment's fried. If you leave me here... repo team might find me first. Please. Just help me up.
They're coming for my chrome. All of it. I'll be back to baseline. Back to Tier 0. Six years of work, gone. I can't... I can't do this. Help me. Please.

key_dialogue.context: If enemy path, player needs help
key_dialogue.text: You left me in that crash. I remember. Now you need my help? Funny how that works. Karma's real, and it's coming for you.
Don't do what I did. Stay independent. The corpo loan looks good at first, but the interest... it never stops. You're never free.
